sentences.en: A fully differential charge pump for a frequency synthesizer is proposed.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种应用于频率综合器的全差分电荷泵电路.

sentences.en: And another has turned it into a synthesizer.
sentences.cn: 还有人让计算器变成了合成器.

sentences.en: Chaos phenomenon of sampling phase - detector digital synthesizer loop is studied.
sentences.cn: 研究三角形取样鉴相数字合成器锁相环中的混沌现象.

sentences.en: Complex Wave Synthesizer complete source code can be used directly.
sentences.cn: 波合成完整的源代码可以直接使用.

sentences.en: Frequency synthesizer is the hardcore of a electronic system.
sentences.cn: 频率合成器是电子系统的核心部件.

sentences.en: High quality voice synthesizer. Versatile 10 sec instant voice ROM.
sentences.cn: 高质量的语音合成器. 多功能10秒即时语音光盘.

sentences.en: I won't try to pronounce their names because my speech synthesizer makes a mess of them.
sentences.cn: 我就不说它们的名字了,因为我的语音合成器会把它们弄乱的.

sentences.en: Impulse test. This procedure for the AD 9850 ( DDS ) Direct Digital Frequency Synthesizer C language source code.
sentences.cn: 脉冲发生测试. 此程序为AD9850 ( DDS ) 直接数字频率合成器C语言源码.

sentences.en: In this paper, a fractional - N frequency synthesizer based on high - order single - bit Σ� � modulator is introduced.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍了高阶 单比特 Σ△调制器在小数分频频率综合器中的应用.

sentences.en: Low latency MIDI input for real - time synthesizer feedback.
sentences.cn: 低延迟的MIDI输入 实时 合成器反馈.

sentences.en: MIDIMIDI is short for Musical Instrument Digital Interface, a standard specification developed by music synthesizer manufacturers.
sentences.cn: MIDI是 乐器数字接口的缩写.它是由音乐合成器制造商开发的标准规范.

sentences.en: Now he can only communicate through a voice synthesizer.
sentences.cn: 如今他只能通过声音合成器来进行交流。

sentences.en: PLL frequency synthesizer with DDS reference will adapt to local oscillator of modern radio.
sentences.cn: 采用DDS输出作为参考的PLL频率合成器非常适合用做现代电台的本振.

sentences.en: The highest frequency synthesizer JiHe 26.5 can reach.
sentences.cn: 这种合成器的最高频率可达26.5吉赫.

sentences.en: The key building blocks in the frequency synthesizer are - controlled oscillator ( VCO ) and high frequency divider circuit.
sentences.cn: 压 控振荡器 与除频器是频率合成器电路中,主要的电路之一.

sentences.en: Voice Synthesizer - KITT can mimic anyone's voice with this.
sentences.cn: 语音合成 - 基特可以模仿任何人的声音与此有关.

words.tran_cn: 综合，[化学] 合成；综合体

trans.tran_cn: 合成者，合成物，合成器，综合器
trans.tran_en: an electronic instrument that produces the sounds of various musical instruments
